name: にちか
trans:
────Focus... my balance on my... pivot foot...
Guh...────

name: にちか
trans:
...Guh.
...One more time────

name: にちか
text:
『今週の収録分、台本が届いてる
紙で出したものも後で渡すよ』
trans:
"The scripts for your jobs this week have arrived.
I'll hand the print copies over to you later on."

name: にちか
trans:
──────
One more time...

name: にちか
text:
────っ……
す、すみません……
trans:
────Guh...
I-I'm so sorry...

name: 舞踏講師
text:
まぁ、合わせるのは初だし……まだ時間はあるから
ただ、今の練習量だと────
trans:
Well, this is the first time you've done the routine
together... There's still time. However, with how
little practice you've been getting in────

name: にちか
text:
だ、大丈夫です。大丈夫です……！
練習時間とってますし、絶対次までに作ってくるので……！
trans:
I-I can fix that. I'll figure something out...!
I'll make some time for practice, and I'll be ready to
do the routine together next time...!

name: 舞踏講師
text:
────七草さんは今日は少し残れるんだっけ？
そしたら合わせはここまで。ちょっと集中練習しよう
trans:
Nanakusa-san, you can stay a little late today, yes?
In that case, we'll leave it at that for trying the
routine together. You can practice by yourself.

name: にちか
text: はい……！
trans: Yes...!

name: プロデューサー
text:
────ありがとな、感謝祭のこと
ふたりがチャレンジしてくれてるの、嬉しいよ
trans:
────Thanks, for the huge help you've been with
FanFest. It makes me happy the way you both are
challenging yourselves.

name: 美琴
text: うん
trans: Mm.

name: プロデューサー
text:
舞踊の先生も紹介してもらって……
何から何まで、頼りっきりだな
trans:
And you sought out that dance instructor too...
I've had you to rely on for so many of the details
of the performance.

name: 美琴
text:
……レッスンの段取りを付けたのは私じゃない
ステージの打ち合わせもかなり綿密なものになるし
trans:
...I'm not the one who schedules all the lessons.
You're the one who handles all of the logistics, too.

name: 美琴
text: 頼りにしてるの
trans: You've been reliable yourself.

name: マネージャー
trans:
...Mikoto.
I need to talk to you...────

name: プロデューサー
text:
……それはもちろんだよ
ふたりが考えるのは、舞台の上のこと
trans:
...Well, that's just doing my job.
What happens onstage is up to the two of you.

name: プロデューサー
text: 舞台の下のことは、俺の役目だ
trans:
But what happens behind the scenes?
That's where I come in.

name: マネージャー
text:
ファン感のこと、もう練習してくれてるでしょ？
……すごいアイディアだなーって、感心してるんだ
trans:
You've already started practicing for the fan
event, haven't you? ...I'm so impressed by the idea
that you and Luca had for it.

name: 美琴
text:
ありがとう
もっと詰めていこうって話していたの
trans: Thank you. We've been discussing how we need to start having more practice so we can prepare properly.

name: マネージャー
text:
そっか……
………………その、ごめんね────
trans:
You have, huh...
...Um, I'm so sorry, but────

name: マネージャー
text: ルカのスケジュールが……これ以上は取れないの
trans: I can't allow practice for it to take up any more of Luca's schedule.

name: お笑い
text:
あ、にちかー！　おっはよー
今日もよろしくねー
trans:
Oh, Nichika! Hey.
Let's make a great show today!

name: にちか
text:
……っ
おはようございます。よろしくお願いしますー……！
trans:
...Uh. Hello to you too!
Let's knock it out of the park...!

name: にちか
text:
……ていうか
その呼び方やめてもらえたら嬉しいですー！
trans: ...Also, I'd appreciate if you would stop calling me "Nichika"!

name: お笑い
text:
あっはは、やるかこのやろー！
にちかにちかにちかー！
trans:
Ahaha, you wanna go, brat?
Nichika, Nichika, Nichika!

name: マネージャー
text:
ルカ、レギュラーもまた決まったでしょ……？　もちろん
ファン感は成功させたい。……でも大事なタイミングなの
trans:
Luca's been made a show regular again, yeah...?
Of course I want the fan event to be a huge
success too. But this is a critical time for her...

name: 美琴
text: そうだね
trans: That's true.

name: お笑い
text:
今日さ、なんか仕込んじゃおうぜー
リハの後ちょっと時間あるっしょ？
trans: Hey, you wanna get together and think up some gags and stuff today? You should have some time after rehearsal, right?

name: にちか
text:
えっ
あー、リハの後ー……────
trans:
Eh!
Hmmm, after rehearsal...───

name: にちか
text:
だ、大丈夫です。大丈夫です……！
練習時間とってますし、絶対次までに作ってくるので……！
trans:
I-I can fix that. I'll figure something out...!
I'll make some time for practice, and I'll be ready to
do the routine together next time...!

name: にちか
text:
……うーん。時間厳しめなんですよね、正直ー
めっちゃめちゃ忙しいのでー！
trans: ...I don't think I can. To be honest, I have barely any flexibility right now. I'm really, really busy!

name: お笑い
text: え、何ー。そんなー？
trans:
Huh, what's the deal?
You really that tied up?

name: にちか
text:
ですですー
暇な芸人さんと一緒にされたくないですねー！
trans:
I sure am! I'm not a good-for-nothing comedian,
I don't have that much free time on my hands.

name: お笑い
text: ……えー
trans: ...Heeey.

name: マネージャー
text:
……それから、今日会議があって
コンテンポラリーっていうのは、しばらくやめておこうって
trans:
...So, since we have that meeting later today.
I think then'll be a good time to tell Luca that we're
giving up on the contemporary dance idea for now.

name: にちか
text:
……じゃ、失礼しまーす
あ、控室勝手に覗かないでくださいねー
trans:
...Well, I've got to get going.
Oh, and please don't go peeping in on me in the
dressing room, okay?

name: にちか
text:
…………えっ
す、すみません、今のつっこんでもらっていいですかねー！
trans:
...Eh. F-forgive me, that wasn't serious!
Go ahead and hit me with one of your usual
snarky comebacks!

name: お笑い
text: ……いいんだけどさ
trans: ...Look, it's not a huge deal, but.

name: お笑い
text: 俺、あくまで共演者だからね？
trans: At the end of the day we're co-stars, yeah?

name: マネージャー
text:
今は時期が早いかなって……
ふたりのこと、じっくり育てていきたいの
trans:
It feels like it might be a little too early for it...
I'd like to take my time in helping the two of you
develop as a unit.

name: マネージャー
text:
いつも応援してくれてる人は喜んでくれると思う
私も、こういうことどんどんやれるようにしていきたいよ？
trans:
I think your existing fans would have been thrilled
by the contemporary dance, and I'd love to let you
try more things like that in the future?

name: マネージャー
text:
でも、『そういうユニットなんだ』って……
イメージ固まると、敷居が高いと思うお客さんも出てくる
trans:
But if your image gets too associated with the
experimental... Some of the audience will start
thinking that you're a hard unit to get into.

name: 美琴
text: ……そうだね
trans: ...That's true.

name: マネージャー
trans: ...Mikoto────

name: にちか
text:
す、すみません……
……失礼しました。私────
trans:
I'm really sorry...
...That was extremely rude of me. I────

name: お笑い
text: 忙しいんでしょー、はいはい
trans: Yeah yeah, you're busy.

name: お笑い
text:
……七草さんの兄貴とかじゃないから、俺
番組作ってるチームっつうか……そのへんよろしくー
trans:
...I'm not your big brother, Nanakusa-san.
You can't treat me like it. We're more like, a team
that creates a show together... Keep that in mind.

name: 美琴
text:
うん
それじゃあ、別のセットリスト考えないとね
trans:
Mm.
In that case, we'll need to think of a different setlist.

name: マネージャー
text:
あのね、ごめん美琴
ほんとに────
trans:
Look Mikoto, I'm sorry.
I really am────

name: 美琴
text:
いい加減なものは見せられないし……
仕方ないと思うけど
trans:
If the performance can't be done properly...
Then it's a shame, but I think it's inevitable.

name: 美琴
text:
────こういうことやらせてもらえるの、
なかなかない機会だから
trans: ────It's rare to be given an opportunity to do something like this.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……それは俺の言葉だ
曲なんかもどうしていくか、早々に詰めよう
trans: ...I should be the one saying that. Let's try and figure out what we're doing for the music as soon as possible.

name: プロデューサー
trans: Though────

name: 舞踏講師
text:
────ちょっと難しいかもしれませんね……
もちろん、格好だけはつくようにしますけど
trans:
────It's starting to look like this might not be
completely feasible... Sure, it's slowly coming
together, but.

name: 舞踏講師
text:
緋田は時間があっても、
彼女はそうじゃないんでしょう？　それに彼女────
trans: Even if Aketa has plenty of time to practice, that's not the case for Nanakusa. Not to mention, Nanakusa doesn't have────

name: プロデューサー
text:
────ええ
恐らく……力量的に、少し時間が足りないですよね
trans:
────Yeah. With her current capabilities taken
into consideration... I fear it's likely that there
won't be quite enough time.

name: プロデューサー
trans: ...Nevermind, it's nothing────

name: スマホ画面
text:
『感謝祭のこと、少し相談しないか
収録の後、挨拶だけ回ってくるから、晩メシにしよう』
trans:
"I'd like to talk to you about FanFest. I was planning
to stop by the studio after you're done recording,
so why don't we discuss things over dinner?"

name: にちか
trans:
───────
All this talk of FanFest... and gratitude...

name: 美琴
trans: ────Gratitude.

name: にちか
text: って
trans: What am I supposed────

name: にちか
trans: To feel grateful for────?
